path.wiser.mobile.db
Class WiserQuery

java.lang.Object
  path.wiser.mobile.db.WiserQuery

public class WiserQuery
extends java.lang.Object

This object houses all the queries you can do with the WiserDatabase. To simplify what you have to do, there are a set of template queries that are used a lot. There is a special USER_DEFinded query type that allows you to specify a non-template query. Use the default constructor and setters to populate your query.

Author:
anisbet
